 Frees an entire trie.

Detailed Description

Implementation of a Prefix Tree (trie) to act as a hash table.

See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trie for more information.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum trie_insert_flags

Flags to affect the behavior of trie_insert().

Enumerator:
TRIE_INSERT_FLAG_SKIP  Don't overwrite payloads
TRIE_INSERT_FLAG_OVERWRITE  Overwrite payload if key already found

enum trie_insert_results

The return value of trie_insert().

Enumerator:
TRIE_INSERT_ERROR  Inserting resulted in an error.
TRIE_INSERT_EXISTS  This key was already found.
TRIE_INSERT_SUCCESS  Successful insertion.

enum trie_search_results

The return value of trie_search_node_closest().

Enumerator:
TRIE_SEARCH_ERROR  The search returned an error.
TRIE_SEARCH_EMPTY  The trie was empty.
TRIE_SEARCH_CLOSEST  The closest match that was not exact was found.
TRIE_SEARCH_EXACT  An exact match was found.
